de.deadmist.deadSimpleHttp.handlers.provided

Class CatchAllHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.deadmist.deadSimpleHttp.handlers.provided.CatchAllHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RequestHandler

    public class CatchAllHandler
extends Object
implements RequestHandler
    This handler is intended to provide a generic 404 Not Found error to any request
    Use it if you want to hide the 501 Not Implemented - Missing Handler errors
    Author:
    Deadmist
